name: Exodus Infinity
description:
A shoot-em-up with a bit of a twist! 

Controls: Arrow Keys/WASD to move, Spacebar/Ctrl to shoot. You can play it on this page or download a desktop build if you prefer.

First game in Unity - tried to just make it quickly and not be super perfectionist about it. But that doesn't mean it's not fun!

Credits:

  • Made in Unity
  • Sound effects from "8-Bit Sfx" pack by Little Robot Sound Factory
  • Earth model from "Planet Earth Free" pack by headwards
  • Theme composed by me :)
  • Thanks to my friends for their feedback and advice!

(Oh yeah, and let me know if you get a really high score!)
